GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
tools/power turbostat: Fix file pointer leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 2ebf6f5946817f33fb33e613e359229e98164eb3, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit eae97e053fe306edbbe60c934031edf9a8affd3f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tools/power turbostat: Fix file pointer leak
